alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:06PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye and south central Eureka Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 506 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles southwest of Pinto Summit, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nye and south central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
